raging.translation[0].definitions[0].def: very great and hard to control
raging.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: I was in a raging temper.
raging.translation[0].definitions[1].def: continuing strongly and showing no signs of ending
raging.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The show was a raging success.
raging.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a raging headache etc is very painful
raging.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: Richard developed a raging headache and had to lie down.
a raging fever  (=a very high body temperature)
raging.translation[0].definitions[3].def: continuing or moving with great natural force
raging.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: The fire had become a raging blaze.
